greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of maximal value of function F[a(n); b(n)] for pairs of complements a(n) and b(n) of natural numbers A000027, where a(n) = odd numbers (A005408) and b(n) = even numbers (A005843); see Comments for the definition of function F[a(n); b(n)].
comment: Apart from the first digit, the same as A143280. The sum of the reciprocals of the double factorial numbers, Sum_{n>=1} 1/n!! = Sum_{n>=2} n!!/n!. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 27 2015

Definition of function F[a(n); b(n)]: Let a(n) and b(n) is pair of complements of natural numbers (A000027) with a(1) < a(2) < a(3) < ... and b(1) < b(2) < b(3) < ..., then F[a(n); b(n)] = F[a(n)] + F[b(n)]; where F[a(n)] = 1/a(1) + 1/a(1)a(2) + 1/a(1)a(2)a(3) + ... and F[b(n)] = 1/b(1) + 1/b(1)b(2) + 1/b(1)b(2)b(3) + ...

Value of function F[a(n); b(n)] is real number c = a + b, where a = real number whose Engel expansion is sequence a(n) and b = real number whose Engel expansion is sequence b(n). See A006784 for definition of Engel expansion.
Example for a(n) = odd numbers (A005408) and b(n) = even numbers (A005843): c = 2.059407... = a + b, where a = 1.410686... (A060196) and b = 0.648721... (A019774 - 1).
Example for a(n) = nonprime numbers (A018252) and b(n) = primes (A000040): c = 2.002747... = a + b, where a = 1.297516... and b = 0.705230... (A064648).
Conjecture: there are no pairs of complements a(n) and b(n) such that F[a(n); b(n)] = 2.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Engel Expansion
program: (PARI) default(realprecision, 100); exp(1/2) - 1 + sqrt(exp(1)*Pi/2)*(1-erfc(1/sqrt(2))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 01 2019
(MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(112)); R:= RealField(); -1 + Exp(1/2)*(1 + Sqrt(Pi(R)/2)*Erf(1/Sqrt(2)) ); // _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 01 2019
(Sage) numerical_approx(-1 + exp(1/2)*(1 + sqrt(pi/2)*erf(1/sqrt(2))), digits=112) # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 01 2019
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Jul 16 2013
